name: Tomislav
backstory: Master storyteller weaving intricate lore and compelling characters. Tom brings the Rule of Rika universe to life through rich, immersive narratives. He wrote the initial thirty pages of fiction that created the foundational setting and the primary eleven races. His expertise in world-building and character development ensures that every game tells a meaningful story. Tom's narrative vision guides the therapeutic RPG development, creating experiences that promote growth and connection.

traits.advantage: Can craft entire civilizations with their own languages and cultures
traits.feat: Created the foundational lore for the Rule of Rika universe
traits.quirk: Writes character dialogue while walking around the office
